overview: A TV adaptation of Maria Dąbrowska's novel, showing the history of several generations of the Polish noble family against the backdrop of significant historical events at the turn of the 19th and 20th centuries. Bogumił Niechcic, a former insurgent and landowner, marries Barbara Ostrzeńska, also from the once wealthy noble family. Barbara's life is weighed down by the trauma of her first unhappy love and unsatisfied spiritual aspirations. Bogumił works as an administrator of other people's estates. It is Barbara's dream to return to the city. Only at work, Bogumil finds an escape from domestic troubles. Their relationship, not free from misunderstandings, nevertheless lasts. Only the death of Bogumił means radical changes for Barbara, and the outbreak of World War I - fear for the unknown fate of her own and her loved ones.
title: Noce i dnie
